personalInfo.professionalSummary: I'm currently working as a senior software engineer at Goldman Sachs. Strong believer in work, not designation. Passionate about mentoring and helping individuals grow in the field of computer science.

projects.title: Universal Hotel Solution
projects.description: Developed using Angular8 & Python Flask with PostgreSQL, Travis CI, and Docker. Designed for hotel management solutions from small to large scale. Implemented 3-way data binding using Angular & Firebase and OAuth2 authentication.
